itemDescription: British police officer and member of the House of Lords (1920-2014)

wikipedia_page.main: Philip Douglas Knights, Baron Knights,  (3 October 1920 – 11 December 2014) was an English police officer who served as Chief Constable of West Midlands Police, succeeding West Midlands Police's first Chief Constable, Sir Derrick Capper.

response: ** Philip Knights, Baron Knights, police officer and life peer (died 2014)
**Philip Knights, Baron Knights, 94, police officer and peer, Chief Constable of the West Midlands (1975–1985).
*Philip Knights, Baron Knights, 94, English police officer and peer, Chief Constable of the West Midlands (1975–1985).Lord Knights, the architect of West Midlands Police, dies at 94
